item.title: Store Your Files For Free
item.description: With the current state of the economy, you’d expect the best price for file storage to be free – and you’d be right! Anything more would be asking too much. Of course, this applies to storing digital files, not physical ones. Don’t show up at a self-storage facility with boxes of papers expecting free storage – they won’t hesitate to show you the door! Instead, try storing your computer files for free with Mozy (http://www.
